content: la maison de saba autumn fires sock recipe for lacy-ish toe-up socks this is not a whole sock pattern but rather a recipe to be supplemented with your favourite toe and heel i prefer using short-row toe and heel constructions a fabulous one can be bought on ravelry for us $ 1 00 from the sox therapist www ravelry com/patterns/library/fish-lips-kiss-heel this is a recipe for making socks which requires some knowledge on sock construction and your preferred sizing some hints on sizing are given based on my gauge and sock size notes and annotations the recipe gives hints and additional information that can be ignored if you use a different toe and / or heel my sock measures 17cm construction or do not need a mini-gusset with the circumference blocked but flk heel unstretched and fits a 21 cm circumference foot gauge on 10x10 cm 32 stitches and 48 row in stockinette after soaking size 56 stitches european 39 uk 6 us 8 5 narrow feet yarn about 450 yards of fingering solstice yarn poseidon shown in the pics for a different size you can of course adjust your needle size as an alternative you needles 2 5mm us 1½ can also increase or decrease the number of purl stitches between the candle flames or ultimately add more stitch pattern pattern repeats as shown please refer to either chart or written instructions at the here the pattern is a repeat of 14 stitches end of this recipe © la maison de saba 2019 autumn fires page 1 of 5 v 1 1 la maison de saba instructions personally i like to use the fish lips kiss heel method with size 2 5mm needle and using your preferred toe for the toes as well with a construction cast on and work to a toe box of app 5 cm provisional cast-on cast on length and 56 stitches circumference 29 stitches work a flk toe on 1+10+7+10+1 stitches divide your work in 29 instep stitches and 27 sole stitches pick up 28 sole stitches from the instep stitches are the beginning of your round provisional cast on the provisional cast on will give knit 1 row in the round you one stitch less for the sole in row 1 decrease the start pattern on 29 instep stitches knit the sole stitches in number of sole stitches to 27 plain stockinette this applies to all row of the foot if you want to you can work the 24 row of the candle flame pattern 3 times or for mirror your left and right the length you need hand socks which is what i did work your heel in the last row of the third time of the pattern chart or any row according to desired length i need a mini-gusset for my socks with the flk heel for a short row heel continue in the round working 12 after 2 5 times working the row half a pattern repeat with pattern on instep
